manager

Class AbstractAppliance

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.AbstractAppliance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Appliance
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blender, CoffeeMaker, Light

    public abstract class AbstractAppliance
extends java.lang.Object
implements Appliance
    Implements most methods outlined in Appliance. Maps ComponentName to Component. Uses id as unique identifier.
    See Also:
    Component
